title: Project

title: lec5 - hw1
text:
import pandas as pd

df = pd.DataFrame({'product' : ['사과', '딸기', '수박'],
                    'price' : [1800, 1500, 3000],
                    'sales' : [ 24, 38, 13]})
print(df)

  product  price  sales
0      사과   1800     24
1      딸기   1500     38
2      수박   3000     13

title: lec5 - hw1
text:
price_mean =  sum(df['price'] / 3)
sales_mean = sum(df['sales'] / 3)

print(price_mean)
print(sales_mean)

2100.0
25.0

title: HW2 - LS BigData School
text:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

mpg = pd.read_csv('data/mpg.csv')

low_displ = mpg.query('displ <= 4')
high_displ = mpg.query('displ >= 5')

low_displ['hwy'].mean()
high_displ['hwy'].mean()

np.float64(18.07894736842105)






audi = mpg.query('manufacturer == "audi"')
toyota = mpg.query('manufacturer == "toyota"')

audi['cty'].mean()
toyota['cty'].mean()

np.float64(18.529411764705884)






cfh = mpg.query('manufacturer in ["chevrolet", "ford", "honda"]')
cfh['hwy'].mean()

np.float64(22.50943396226415)

title: HW2 - LS BigData School
text:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

mpg = pd.read_csv('data/mpg.csv')

low_displ = mpg.query('displ <= 4')
high_displ = mpg.query('displ >= 5')

low_displ['hwy'].mean()
high_displ['hwy'].mean()

np.float64(18.07894736842105)






audi = mpg.query('manufacturer == "audi"')
toyota = mpg.query('manufacturer == "toyota"')

audi['cty'].mean()
toyota['cty'].mean()

np.float64(18.529411764705884)






cfh = mpg.query('manufacturer in ["chevrolet", "ford", "honda"]')
cfh['hwy'].mean()

np.float64(22.50943396226415)

Q4. 1~3번 문제를 해결할 수 있는 하나로 연결된 pandas 구문을 만들어 실행해 보세요. 데이터는 복사본 대신 mpg 원본을 이용하세요.

mpg = mpg.assign(ch_sum = lambda x: x['cty'] + x['hwy'],
                 ch_mean = lambda x: x['ch_sum'] / 2) \
         .sort_values('ch_mean', ascending = False) \
         .head(3)

title: HW2 - LS BigData School
text:
import pandas as pd
import numpy as np

mpg = pd.read_csv('../data/mpg.csv')

low_displ = mpg.query('displ <= 4')
high_displ = mpg.query('displ >= 5')

low_displ['hwy'].mean()
high_displ['hwy'].mean()

np.float64(18.07894736842105)






audi = mpg.query('manufacturer == "audi"')
toyota = mpg.query('manufacturer == "toyota"')

audi['cty'].mean()
toyota['cty'].mean()

np.float64(18.529411764705884)






cfh = mpg.query('manufacturer in ["chevrolet", "ford", "honda"]')
cfh['hwy'].mean()

np.float64(22.50943396226415)

Q4. 1~3번 문제를 해결할 수 있는 하나로 연결된 pandas 구문을 만들어 실행해 보세요. 데이터는 복사본 대신 mpg 원본을 이용하세요.

mpg = mpg.assign(ch_sum = lambda x: x['cty'] + x['hwy'],
                 ch_mean = lambda x: x['ch_sum'] / 2) \
         .sort_values('ch_mean', ascending = False) \
         .head(3)
